I believe the error can happen if httpd is started with stdout/etc closed; also
mention of strange ulimits for the same symptom in bug 15161.  Are you starting
httpd from apachectl or by some other means?

Lacking feedback; what's the output of "ulimit -a" on a system which shows this
issue?
